member.name: M:Persian.Plus.PaymentGateway.Core.Builder.IPaymentGatewayBuilder.Build
member.summary:
Builds a single instance of which provides an instance of from configured .
You use this method if you don't use Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection in your application. Otherwise in applications such as ASP.NET CORE that uses Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection, you don't need to use this method because that gets done for you.
You can also register the in any other dependency injection tools such as Autofac and use Dependency Injection benefits in your application. For example you can inject the where ever you need.

member.name: T:Persian.Plus.PaymentGateway.Core.Money
member.summary:
Defines money unit.
Note: The official unit of currency in Iran is the Iranian rial (IR). It means the amount of the invoice will be sent to Iranian gateways automatically as by Persian.Plus.PaymentGateway.Core.
Examples:
decimal a = new Money(1000)
long a = new Money(1000)
Money m = 1000.55m
Money m = 1000

Note: The official unit of currency in Iran is the Iranian rial (IR). It means the amount of the invoice will be sent to Iranian gateways automatically as by Persian.Plus.PaymentGateway.Core.
member.param: The amount of money.

member.summary: Performs a new payment request with the given data.
member.param: The gateway which the client must pay the invoice in.

A tracking number for this request. It will be sent to the gateway.
Note: It must be unique for each requests.
The amount of the payment request.

A complete URL of your website. It will be used by the gateway for redirecting the client again to your website.
A complete URL would be like: "http://www.mywebsite.com/foo/bar/"

member.name: M:Persian.Plus.PaymentGateway.Core.PaymentTokenProviders.QueryStringPaymentTokenProviderExtensions.UseGuidQueryStringPaymentTokenProvider(Persian.Plus.PaymentGateway.Core.PaymentTokenProviders.IPaymentTokenBuilder)
member.summary:
Uses the as . It generates a unique as a token for each payments and puts it inside the query string of the URL. The generated token will be retrieved from the query string when the client comes back from the gateway.
Note: This is the default , which means you don't need to call this.

member.param: A delegate to configure the .
